description.narrative: Namibia - Tourism Project: Aims to improve the management and infrastructure of Etosha National Park, enhance the marketing of Namibian tourism, and develop the capacity of communal conservancies to attract investments in ecotourism and increase their revenue.

title.narrative: Attracting New Tourists through Marketing to Namibia
Improving Aspects of Etosha National Park in Namibia
Measuring Results of Namibia Conservancy Support Evaluation

condition.narrative: CP 1.a.1. Infrastructure & Equipment Database and Maintenance Plan
CP 1.a.2. Appointment of ENP Deputy Director
CP 1.a.3. Revised ENP Staffing Plan Adopted
CP 1.a.4. Housing Policy and Code of Conduct adopted
CP 1.a.5. Two (2) ENP Exclusive Access Concessions and two (2) Lodge/Exclusive Accesss Concessions awarded in other NPs
CP 2. Implementation of Galton Gate Plan
Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.

description.narrative: Level Outcome of The annual number of paying visitors to Etosha National Park.

title.narrative: North American tourism businesses that offer Namibian tours or tour packages

description.narrative: Level Outcome of The number of new tourism- and natural resource-related jobs, including permanent and casual part- and full-time jobs, created in the MCA-N-supported conservancies during the Compact period. This excludes jobs created in INP enterprises.
